rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw a card and create a Treasure token, a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, and a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Let's hope it fetches a high price, eh partner?”[/i]
